<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/oidc/clients/{id}/logo"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Get the logo image for an OIDC client

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"description":"Client ID","in":"path","name":"id","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"Logo image","content":{"image/png":{"schema":{"type":"string","format":"binary"}},"image/jpeg":{"schema":{"type":"string","format":"binary"}},"image/svg+xml":{"schema":{"type":"string","format":"binary"}}}}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
